about_the_game:
Fill your party with magical maids, towering angelic knights, lab coat-wearing alchemists, and more with the Heroine Character Generator 9 for MZ pack! Gee-kun-soft’s latest generator pack offers up 47 female parts to help your party members and important NPCs stand out from background characters. Give your punk heroine two-tone hair and a dark coat to wear while your Edo-inspired NPCs dress in gorgeous kimonos.

This pack includes 5 AccA, 5 AccB, 20 Clothing, 5 Eyes, 5 Front Hair, 5 Rear Hair, 1 Facial Mark, and 1 Glasses parts to give your character designs some updates! Create a straight-haired heroine who starts the game as a maid or shopkeeper’s assistant wearing a simple apron over a dress, and who ditches her uniform for a fiery red dress and cape combo or gilded white armor with a matching headdress to match her fighting style. Give your witch party member a dark and spiky cloak or a dress decorated in stars depending on her powers, and have your isekai-ed heroine with long twin-tails keep her more modern and comfortable dress instead of wearing one of the fantastical outfits.

Add even more fantasy to your world with Jiangshi-inspired robes with long sleeves and a talisman attached to a hat, and feathered wings that come out of your heroine’s temples! Smaller pieces like painted face stripes and glasses can add that last detail your heroine has been missing. If you’ve been wanting more options for dresses and detailed robes and some eye-catching accessories, pick up the Heroine Character Generator 9 for MZ pack!

This pack includes: 

Clothes: 20 Female
Eyes: 5 sets
Accessories: 10 Female
A pair of glasses: 1
Facial mark: 1
Front Hair: 5 Female
Rear Hair: 5 Female

※Please read before purchasing※

This generator material comes with an optimized base body, so please save the default base body in a separate local folder, etc., and then store the optimized base body in each generator folder.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
